about.title: About Us
about.description3: we design and develop fast, secure, bilingual (EN/ES) websites, landing pages, and Shopify stores from Miami, FL. With Next.js, Tailwind, Express, PostgreSQL, and Shopify, we launch quickly, rank better, and scale sustainably. From simple sites to robust e-commerce and custom backends, we focus on performance, SEO, and maintainability.

questions.q: How long does a website or Shopify project take?
questions.a: Most sites and landing pages: 2–4 weeks. Shopify stores or custom backends: 3–6 weeks depending on scope.

questions.q: Do you deliver bilingual sites with localized SEO?
questions.a: Yes. We implement EN/ES content, semantic structure, metadata, and local SEO essentials.

questions.q: Do you configure payments, shipping, and taxes?
questions.a: Yes. We set up Stripe/BMSPay/PayPal, shipping rules or carrier rates, and tax settings.

questions.q: What is the project payment schedule?
questions.a: Typically 50% upfront and 50% at launch. Milestone-based options are available.

questions.q: Do you offer maintenance after launch?
questions.a: Yes. Care plans with monitoring, security updates, and continuous optimization.
